document_data.name: ''Mask of the Owl''
document_data.creator: [[Shevarith Kendia]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Mask of the Owl''''' was an [[enchanted]] mask created by the [[rashemi]] [[wizard]] [[Shevarith Kendia]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The ''Mask'' was in the style of those worn by the [[Witches of Rashemen]], and was intended to invoke the predatory presence of an [[owl]]. It was complemented by the rest of her custom clothing, including her enchanted [[boots]], called the ''[[Claws of the Owl]]''.
document_data.Powers: Shevarith imbued the ''Mask of the Owl'' with the power to paralyze her foes with fear, allowing her to cast ''[[power word, stun]]''.
document_data.History: The design and powers of the ''Mask of the Owl'' were inspired by a memorable event from Shevarith's childhood in which she witnessed a snowy owl cause its prey to freeze in terror with a screech.
document_data.Notable Owners: * Shevarith Kendia, who worked as an [[adventurer]] on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]], the [[Open Lord]] of [[Waterdeep]], during the late 15{{th}} century DR.
